=head1 NAME

ObConf - configuration utility for Openbox.

=head1 SYNOPSIS

obconf [I<options>] [I<ARCHIVE.obt>]

=head1 DESCRIPTION

B< ObConf > is a preferences manager for Openbox (version 3.0 and up).
Its user interface is rather self-explanatory and thus does not need to
be documented in this manual page.

=head1 OPTIONS

=over 8

=item B<--install I<ARCHIVE.obt>>

Installs the given theme archive and selects it.

=item B<--archive I<THEME>>

Create a theme archive from the given theme directory.

=item B<--config-file I<FILE>>

Specify the path to the configuration file to use.

=item B<--version>

Displays information about the currently installed version and exists.

=head1 BUGS

Please report bugs at http://bugzilla.icculus.org.
